OrgName.entry: SPECIALIST PSYCHOTHERAPY SERVICE - SHEFFIELD CARE TRUST

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Care Trust. Provides a service for adults, offering specialist assessment and treatment in a range of psychotherapeutic methods, including cognitive behavioural psychotherapy and psychoanalytic psychotherapy, systemic psychotherapy and cognitive analytical psychotherapy (individual and group). Clinics are held most days at Brunswick House, plus cognitive behavioural psychotherapy clinics at the Michael Carlisle Centre. Referral is via GP, community mental health team or psychiatrist, once a referral is accepted an assessment is offered.
